Class CompanyRepController

Object
CompanyRepController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICompanyRepController
public class CompanyRepController extends Object implements ICompanyRepController
Implementation of the ICompanyRepController interface. This controller manages internship opportunities created by company representatives and depends only on the IDataRepo abstraction.
